MWC.GUI.Chart.Painters

Class TimeDisplayPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Chart.Painters.TimeDisplayPainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, DynamicPlottable, Editable, ExcludeFromRightClickEdit, ExtendedEditable, NotInBaseLayer, Plottable

    public class TimeDisplayPainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plottable, DynamicPlottable, ExtendedEditable, java.io.Serializable, ExcludeFromRightClickEdit, NotInBaseLayer
    Class to plot a time display onto a plot

    Serialized Form

        public WorldArea getBounds()

        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface Plottable
        Returns:
